title: Meeting the people behind the ride – SBT GRVL 2023
content:
Meet just a sliver of the people riding SBT GRVL gravel race this year from All Bodies on Bikes, Ride for Racial Justice, and more.

Read the full article at Meeting the people behind the ride – SBT GRVL 2023 on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
